code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const useUser=()=>{const context=useContext(UserContext);if(!context){throw new Error('useUser must be used within a UserProvider');}return context;};export const UserProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const login=userData=>{setUser(userData);localStorage.setItem('healthmate_user',JSON.stringify(userData));};const logout=()=>{setUser(null);localStorage.removeItem('healthmate_user');};const value={user,setUser,login,logout};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserContext.Provider,{value:value,children:children});};
